name: 4. H overall bonus
description: It is recommended to play the H map on this difficulty level. It takes effect at 200% difficulty. The experience of computer heroes is 6 times, and the weekly production of urban creatures is 3 times.

chinese.name: 4. H overall bonus
chinese.description: 此难度推荐玩H图，200%难度下生效，电脑英雄6倍经验，城镇生物3倍周产。

author: Nordsoft
